_comment: Risk management configuration. Copy to risk.json and customize.

position_management._comment: take_profit: +1%, stop_loss: -0.5%, trailing: disabled by default

position_sizing._comment: Quarter-Kelly for safety. Max 15% of portfolio per position.

portfolio_limits._comment: Max 80% invested, max 10 positions, max 30% per sector

circuit_breakers._comment: Emergency stop: -10% drawdown, 5 consecutive losses, or VIX>35
